product_name: Klean Kanteen Coated-Steel Quick Water Bottle Cage
long_description: This mount-anywhere cage will hold your Klean Kanteen securely while protecting its brushed or painted finish. And, it fits not only on bikes but ladders, lawn mowers, off-road vehicles and strollers!
short_description: This mount-anywhere cage will hold your Klean Kanteen securely while protecting its brushed or painted finish. And, it fits not only on bikes but ladders, lawn mowers, off-road vehicles and strollers!
